cars.name: Toyota Camry
cars.short_description: The Toyota Camry is a reliable family sedan with excellent fuel efficiency.
cars.detailed_description: The latest Toyota Camry features a sleek design, advanced safety features, and a comfortable interior. It's perfect for daily commuting.

cars.name: Toyota RAV4
cars.short_description: The Toyota RAV4 is a versatile SUV with spacious interiors.
cars.detailed_description: The Toyota RAV4 offers a blend of style, comfort, and utility. With its all-wheel drive, it's perfect for both city and off-road adventures.

cars.name: Toyota Supra
cars.short_description: The Toyota Supra is a legendary sports car known for its speed and agility.
cars.detailed_description: The latest Toyota Supra is a high-performance sports car with a turbocharged engine, exceptional handling, and stunning design.

cars.name: Toyota Land Cruiser
cars.short_description: The Toyota Land Cruiser is a rugged and luxurious off-road SUV.
cars.detailed_description: The Toyota Land Cruiser is built for adventure, offering off-road capability and a premium interior. It's the pinnacle of off-road luxury.

cars.name: Ford Fusion
cars.short_description: The Ford Fusion is a stylish and efficient sedan with advanced tech features.
cars.detailed_description: The latest Ford Fusion offers a comfortable ride, modern technology, and great fuel economy, making it an excellent choice for daily commuting.

cars.name: Ford Explorer
cars.short_description: The Ford Explorer is a spacious and versatile SUV with three-row seating.
cars.detailed_description: The Ford Explorer is designed for families, offering a roomy cabin, advanced safety features, and impressive towing capacity.

cars.name: Ford Mustang
cars.short_description: The Ford Mustang is an iconic American muscle car known for its power and style.
cars.detailed_description: The Ford Mustang is a legendary sports car with powerful engine options, exhilarating performance, and classic design.

cars.name: Ford F-150 Raptor
cars.short_description: The Ford F-150 Raptor is a high-performance off-road truck built for adventure.
cars.detailed_description: The Ford F-150 Raptor is the ultimate off-road pickup, offering superb off-road capability and a rugged exterior design.

cars.name: BMW 3 Series
cars.short_description: The BMW 3 Series is a luxury sedan with sporty performance and advanced technology.
cars.detailed_description: The BMW 3 Series combines dynamic handling, elegant interiors, and cutting-edge technology, making it a top choice in the luxury sedan segment.

cars.name: BMW X5
cars.short_description: The BMW X5 is a premium SUV with a spacious and opulent cabin.
cars.detailed_description: The BMW X5 offers a luxurious interior, strong performance, and advanced tech features, making it a superb luxury SUV choice.

cars.name: BMW M8
cars.short_description: The BMW M8 is a high-performance sports car with breathtaking speed and style.
cars.detailed_description: The BMW M8 combines a powerful engine, precise handling, and a stunning design, setting the bar for luxury sports cars.

cars.name: BMW i8
cars.short_description: The BMW i8 is a hybrid sports car with futuristic looks and exceptional performance.
cars.detailed_description: The BMW i8 is a plug-in hybrid with striking design, quick acceleration, and an eco-friendly approach to supercar performance.

cars.name: Mercedes-Benz C-Class
cars.short_description: The Mercedes-Benz C-Class is a luxury sedan with a blend of elegance and performance.
cars.detailed_description: The Mercedes-Benz C-Class offers a stylish interior, refined ride, and a range of powerful engine options, making it a symbol of luxury.

cars.name: Mercedes-Benz GLE
cars.short_description: The Mercedes-Benz GLE is a premium SUV with cutting-edge technology and a comfortable ride.
cars.detailed_description: The Mercedes-Benz GLE is packed with advanced tech features, a spacious cabin, and exceptional comfort, offering a top-tier luxury SUV experience.

cars.name: Mercedes-AMG GT
cars.short_description: The Mercedes-AMG GT is a high-performance sports car with stunning looks and thrilling power.
cars.detailed_description: The Mercedes-AMG GT is a statement of pure performance, featuring a handcrafted engine, breathtaking speed, and aggressive styling.

cars.name: Mercedes-Benz SLS AMG
cars.short_description: The Mercedes-Benz SLS AMG is a supercar with gullwing doors and extraordinary performance.
cars.detailed_description: The Mercedes-Benz SLS AMG is an iconic supercar known for its unique design, explosive power, and unmatched luxury.

cars.name: Honda Civic
cars.short_description: The Honda Civic is a compact sedan known for its reliability and fuel efficiency.
cars.detailed_description: The latest Honda Civic offers a sleek design, comfortable interior, and advanced safety features, making it a top choice for daily commuting.

cars.name: Honda CR-V
cars.short_description: The Honda CR-V is a versatile SUV with spacious interiors and a reputation for reliability.
cars.detailed_description: The Honda CR-V is designed for families, offering a roomy cabin, excellent cargo space, and a comfortable ride.

cars.name: Honda Accord
cars.short_description: The Honda Accord is a midsize sedan with a comfortable and well-appointed interior.
cars.detailed_description: The Honda Accord combines a spacious and high-quality interior with a smooth ride, making it a solid choice for a family sedan.

cars.name: Honda CR-V Hybrid
cars.short_description: The Honda CR-V Hybrid is an eco-friendly SUV with impressive fuel economy.
cars.detailed_description: The Honda CR-V Hybrid combines the versatility of the CR-V with a hybrid powertrain, offering excellent efficiency and a comfortable ride.

cars.name: Tesla Model 3
cars.short_description: The Tesla Model 3 is an electric sedan with advanced self-driving capabilities.
cars.detailed_description: The Tesla Model 3 offers impressive electric range, Autopilot, and a minimalist interior design, making it a leader in electric mobility.

cars.name: Tesla Model Y
cars.short_description: The Tesla Model Y is a versatile electric SUV with spacious interiors.
cars.detailed_description: The Tesla Model Y provides ample cargo space, seating for up to seven, and the benefits of electric propulsion, all in one package.

cars.name: Tesla Model S
cars.short_description: The Tesla Model S is a luxury electric sedan with incredible acceleration and range.
cars.detailed_description: The Tesla Model S sets the standard for electric luxury with its high-performance variants, spacious cabin, and cutting-edge technology.

cars.name: Tesla Model X
cars.short_description: The Tesla Model X is an electric SUV with distinctive Falcon Wing doors and exceptional performance.
cars.detailed_description: The Tesla Model X offers a unique driving experience with its innovative doors, impressive range, and advanced tech features.
